title: Juan Manuel Castro Pippo (Jotape)
description:
Hello! I am passionate about technology and innovation. I was born in 1990 and I have always had a great interest in everything related to technology, especially in the world of blockchain.
I am a strong defender of the conservation of the environment and I try to lead a respectful life with the environment.
I love to stay active by being physically active outdoors. For the last two years I have been especially involved in running.
I firmly believe that sports and nutrition are essential to maintain a healthy mind and body.

title: Juan Francisco Razzini (Juancho)
description:
Hello! I am a 32-year-old graphic designer, passionate about creativity and innovation.
I currently work in a television production company, where I apply my design skills to create unique and captivating audiovisual pieces.
Lately I have been learning about 3D modeling, which has allowed me to explore new forms of expression in my work as a graphic designer.
I like to challenge myself and look for ways to continue growing as a professional and as a person. Thank you for visiting my profile!

title: Mauro Hern√°n Falcone (Mou)
description:
My goal is to leave a mark in each place, exchanging knowledge, learning to take on challenges that allow me to grow in my professional career.
I enjoy working with challenges that require innovation, creativity, management and commitment.
I consider myself a proactive and self-taught person, right now focused on increasing my knowledge in programming, IT project management and network security.
Graphic designer with more than 10 years of experience working both freelance and under a dependency relationship.
